name: 2347 - Venture Into the Night
description:
Text based SciFi-horror interactive fiction written in Twine for #LuxJam

-Recommended to play in fullscreen.

(Note: contains occasional use of bad language, dark humour and descriptive passages regarding scenes of violence)

The year is 2347. Climate change has thinned the ozone layer, exposing the Earth to harmful levels of UV light. Many plant and animal species have gone extinct and the population of humans has been cut in half.

The sun is deadly. You cannot go outside during the day.

At night, the temperature falls below freezing.

You're running out of food. You must venture out. Will you survive?
